explains: n. 卡拉 OK; 卡拉 OK 录音，自动伴奏录音

sentences.en: The tempo can be adjusted manually on conventional karaoke machines, but the new product is the first machine to do it automatically.
sentences.cn: 传统的卡拉 OK 机可以手动调节节奏，但这款新产品是第一台可以自动调节节奏的机器。

sentences.en: Come to the karaoke night—it should be a good laugh.
sentences.cn: 来参加卡拉OK晚会吧—一定很开心。

sentences.en: Shall we go to a Karaoke?
